definition: insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen
(of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume

sentences.english: FBB is at her most beautiful with minimal makeup.
sentences.chinese: 范冰冰在淡妝的時候最美麗。

sentences.english: Keep your make up simple and use no more than one ring on each hand.
sentences.chinese: 化淡妝，每隻手上的戒指不要超過一個。

sentences.english: Can make up weak appropriately, do not wear heavy make-up.
sentences.chinese: 可以適當地化些淡妝，不要濃妝豔抹。

sentences.english: Today of I the simple attire that turned a little, be dressed in easy and convenient clothes.
sentences.chinese: 今天的我只化了一點點的淡妝，穿着輕便的衣裳。

definition: (of a woman) to adorn oneself/makeup/adornment/trousseau/stage makeup and costume
to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
lit. hiding the moon, shaming the flowers (idiom)/fig. female beauty exceeding even that of the natural world
to apply makeup to the eyebrows/(bird species of China) Chinese hwamei (Garrulax canorus)
to make up/elaborately made up woman
to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom)/dressed to the nines and wearing makeup
